# 5.0 Docs

## Windows Forms

- [Native code can't access Windows Forms objects](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/5.0/winforms-objects-not-accessible-from-native-code.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 where Windows Forms objects are no longer accessible from native code.
- [DataGridView doesn't reset custom fonts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/5.0/datagridview-doesnt-reset-custom-font-settings.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 where DataGridView no longer resets default cell style fonts to match the ambient font if the cell style font has been customized.
- [Methods throw ArgumentException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/5.0/invalid-args-cause-argumentexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 where some Windows Forms methods now throw an ArgumentException for invalid arguments.
- [Methods throw ArgumentNullException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/5.0/null-args-cause-argumentnullexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 where some Windows Forms methods now throw an ArgumentNullException for null arguments.
- [Properties throw ArgumentOutOfRangeException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/5.0/invalid-args-cause-argumentoutofrangeexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 where Some Windows Forms properties now throw an ArgumentOutOfRangeException for invalid arguments.
- [TextFormatFlags.ModifyString is obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/5.0/modifystring-field-of-textformatflags-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 where the TextFormatFlags.ModifyString field is obsolete as a warning.
- [DataGridView APIs throw InvalidOperationException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/5.0/null-owner-causes-invalidoperationexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 where some APIs related to DataGridView throw an exception if the object's DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Owner value is null.
- [Removed status bar controls](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/5.0/winforms-deprecated-controls.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 where some Windows Forms controls are no longer available.
